item.description: Spring Kafka Writer and Readers What is Kafka? Apache Kafka is an open-source stream-processing software platform developed by the Apache Software Foundation written in Scala and Java. You’ll find more information about Kafka at it http://kafka.apache.org/intro.html[Homepage]. Intro to Spring For Apache Kafka Project The Spring for Apache Kafka (spring-kafka) project applies core Spring concepts to the development of Kafka-based messaging solutions. It provides a “template” as a high-level abstraction for sending messages.

It provides a “template” as a high-level abstraction for sending messages.
